description: Light and packable vest for trekking and various outdoor escapes. A smart insulating garment that is perfect as a mid-layer on chilly summer evenings, when trekking at high altitudes or over a fleece or t-shirt to keep your core warm. Made from pliant recycled polyamide with synthetic padding that keeps its warming properties even when damp. Part of Fjällräven's Expedition Series
name: Fjallraven Expedition X-Latt Vest - Mens
